title: Fossil
subtitle: As you look at fossils in different rock layers, the life recorded in those fossils changes.

title: Vertebrate Diagram One
subtitle: As the conditions on Earth change, so do the organisms.

title: Comparative Anatomy
subtitle: Animals that look similar on the outside may not look the same on the inside.

title: Embryonic Development
subtitle: Different animals can look the same at one point in their development.
